Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Twenty patients received coronary CTA immediately in the ED , 18 of whom were discharged following CTA ( 90 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Coronary Artery Disease (implied) |

In this paragraph, the term "coronary CTA" refers to a diagnostic test used to evaluate for the presence and severity of coronary artery disease. While the paragraph does not explicitly mention the disease itself, it is the reason why the patients were receiving the test in the first place. Therefore, it is implied that the patients in the paragraph have coronary artery disease.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Coronary Artery Disease |

In the paragraph, the only entity that clearly refers to a disease is "Coronary Artery Disease," which is the condition for which the patients were receiving the coronary CTA test.
